title: The openat2 syscall test step
description: The openat2 syscall test step runs the openat2 system call with the provided arguments

dirFd.description: The file descriptor referring to the directory containing the 'pathname'

pathname.description: The path that must be opened. If it is relative, it is interpreted relative to the directory referred to by 'dirFd'

how.description: Specifies how 'pathname' should be opened, and acts as a superset of the flags and mode arguments to openat

flags.description: The openat2 open_how structure flags, expressed as an OR-ed combination of the supported flags or as integer

mode.description: The openat2 open_how structure mode, expressed as an OR-ed combination of the supported modes or as integer

resolve.description: The openat2 open_how structure resolve flags, expressed as an OR-ed combination of the supported modes or as integer
